name: iPhone
description: Apple's original iPhone introduced multi-touch and combined an iPod, phone and internet communicator into one device.
fun_facts: First iPhone did not support third-party native apps — only web apps.
Announced by Steve Jobs on January 9, 2007, at Macworld.

name: iphone
description: also known as the iPhone 2G since it supported 2G, it was Apple's first ever smartphone and it included a multi-touch display
fun_facts: The iPhone was seen as a 3-in-1 device being a phone, iPod and internet browser
It costed $599 for a 8GB model which at the time was seem as very expensive for a phone
